subtitleNullable: Debt, GDP, Corruption, GNI, Growth, Trade, Debt, Happiness Level, GDP per Capita
descriptionNullable:
This original purpose of this dataset is to analyze the effectiveness of foreign aid in different developing countries. It is a time series data that records different statistics of a country by year.
There are 9 features: **Aid amount, GDP, GDP growth, GDP per Capita, GNI, Corruption, Happiness, Trade, Debt**. Additionally, the log value of GDP and Aid/GDP are added within EDA.
All the data are scraped from the *World Bank Database* as well as the *Transparency International Corruption Index* and the *World Happiness Report*.
This dataset can be used to test the correlation between different features, such as the relationship between aid and GDP growth. Countries can also be classified by region (e.g. continent) to specify the correlation.
title: Foreign Aid Global Data 2012-2020
subtitle: Debt, GDP, Corruption, GNI, Growth, Trade, Debt, Happiness Level, GDP per Capita

All the data are scraped from the *World Bank Database* as well as the *Transparency International Corruption Index* and the *World Happiness Report*.
This dataset can be used to test the correlation between different features, such as the relationship between aid and GDP growth. Countries can also be classified by region (e.g. continent) to specify the correlation.
